lead_paragraph: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin on Wednesday vetoed a ban on a second-trimester abortion practice.

headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Governor Vetoes Curb on an Abortion Method
headline.main: West Virginia: Governor Vetoes Curb on an Abortion Method

snippet: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin on Wednesday vetoed a ban on a second-trimester abortion practice.
abstract: Gov Earl Ray Tomblin of West Virginia vetoes ban on second-trimester abortions, citing concerns about constitutionality and patient safety.
